        Calls a Method.
        Type Parameters:
        C - The class type.
        R - The return type.
        Parameters:
        classInstance - Instance of the class responsible for the method.
        method - The method to call.
        parameters - Parameters needed when calling the method.

        Return value of the method call if any, else null.
